events.message: I received the package yesterday but I want to return the item and get a refund because it doesn’t meet my expectations.
The system has identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's return and refund keywords.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in refund processing.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to return your item and get a refund. I’m here to help!
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to return the item so we can process the refund accordingly?
My order number is 4589317. The item looks different from the pictures and the quality is poor, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the return process right away and issue a full refund once we receive the product back.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate how fast you’re handling this.
Your return request has been processed. Please ship the item back using the prepaid label sent to your email to receive your refund.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped the item back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
I have shipped the item yesterday and received confirmation from the post office. Thanks again!
Your refund has been successfully processed and should reflect on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our support services.
The customer provided positive feedback in the satisfaction survey, praising the support and resolution speed.
The case is now formally closed following successful refund processing and positive customer feedback.
